greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,m) containing the value of the Fibonacci polynomial F(n,x) at x=m.
reference: Steven Wolfram, The Mathematica Book, Cambridge University Press, 3rd ed. 1996, page 728
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
maple: with(combinat):for n from 0 to 9 do seq(fibonacci(n,m), m = 0 .. n) od; # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 09 2008
program: def T(n, m): return 0 if n==0 else fibonacci(n, m)
for n in range(21): print([T(n, m) for m in range(n + 1)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Aug 12 2017
xref: Main diagonal and first lower diagonal give: A084844, A084845.
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Apr 13 2006
ext: Definition simplified by the Assoc. Editors of the OEIS, Nov 17 2009
